title: Hero Without a Class Who Even Needs Skills
description: In a world where everyone has a class and skills, one hero defies the system by succeeding without any formal training. Follow his journey as he proves that determination beats skills.

ep1.title: The Classless Hero
ep1.description: A hero without a class discovers his unique path in a world obsessed with skills.

ep2.title: Skills Don't Matter
ep2.description: Proving that determination and creativity beat traditional skills every time.
